description: {"blocks":[{"key":"akd3b","text":"This protocol compiles multiple methods for purifying RNA from an S. rosetta lysate and provides a modified reverse transcriptase protocol to robustly synthesize cDNA from transcripts with higher GC content.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"italic","offset":66,"length":10}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
keywords: choanoflagellate, reverse transcription, cDNA, RNA purification
